tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords (
  training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  training_title VARCHAR(255),
  training_date DATE,
  employee_id INT,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  training_duration_hours INT,
  completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_training_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  training_date DATE,
  completion_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE training_courses (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  course_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_training_records (
    employee_id INT,
    training_module_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);
